mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM JXSJ_KCJXSSFA 1=1
and COURSE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{courseName}),'%')
SELECT * FROM JXSJ_KCJXSSFA_ITEM where RELATION_CODE = #{relationCode} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE
mapper.insert: insert into JXSJ_KCJXSSFA (CODE, COURSE_CODE, COURSE_NAME, COURSE_ATTR, COURSE_LEADER, TEACH_CLASS, STUDENT_NUM, CLASS_LOCATION, OPEN_COLLEGE, XN, XQ, USER_ID, USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE) values (#{code},#{courseCode},#{courseName},#{courseAttr},#{courseLeader},#{teachClass},#{studentNum},#{classLocation},#{openCollege},#{xn},#{xq},#{userId},#{userName},CURRENT_DATE)

insert into JXSJ_KCJXSSFA_ITEM ( RELATION_CODE, ITEM_CODE, COURSE_NUM, WEEK, WEEK_NUM, LESSON_NUM, LESSON_HOUR, COMMON_DATE, SKJS_CODE, SKJS_NAME, TEACH_TARGET, TEACH_DESIGN, POLITIC_ELEMENT, CREATE_DATE ) values ( #{code},#{itemCode},#{courseNum},#{week},#{weekNum},#{lessonNum},#{lessonHour},#{commonDate},#{skjsCode},#{skjsName},#{teachTarget},#{teachDesign},#{politicElement},CURRENT_DATE )
